::Battera::

She looked at him,"I'm here on a peace errand.  I'm not here to make 
trouble.  I gave my weapons to Chordate, I promised I'd be no trouble 
or try to cause any."  She stopped and put her hands on her 
hips. "You know,if I was going to do something, don't you think I'd 
have done it by now.  I have walked up and down most of this ship.  
I've had ample oppertunity and time to do anything.  I could have 
escaped long before now.  But I haven't done anything, I haven't run 
away, and to top that, I came here of my own free will to try to talk 
about a truce and hopefully a long standing peace treaty."  She shook 
her head.
"You know, there has been so much hatred between our factions that 
neither group will even try to make peace.  There is so much hate and 
anger and pain that neither one will look past that ans even try to 
talk about peace between us."  She put her hands down and stormed 
past him muttering about how this is going to be a long and hard 
assignment.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex starts to walk after Battera. "I'll escort you."
> 
> He walks after the femm, keeping his gun down. He disliked 
Predacons with a 
> passion, and had no idea why Chordate would let a non-maximal into 
their 
> base, with no supervision.
